config.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget gnupg2 && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - && echo 'deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main' > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list && apt-get update && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable chromium-chromedriver && pip install -r requirements.txt
